Kendo.Mvc.UI.Fluent.GridToolBarCustomCommandBuilder

Defines the fluent interface for configuring toolbar custom command.

Methods

Route(System.String)

Sets command route.

Parameters

routeName System.String

The route name

Returns

The route values

Returns
